fields.description:
h3. Request

Customer is looking to do a two-way ssl authentication using the appcelerator.https module, but currently there is no mention  on the documentation about a feature like this.
fields.summary: Https module: include support for two-way authentication

comments.body:
[~rtlechuga] To confirm:

* They want to implement Mutual/Two-Way authentication as described here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mutual_authentication
* They will be packaging additional certificates with the application as necessary, as illustrated here: https://intrepidusgroup.com/insight/2011/10/mutual-authentication-in-android-and-ios/
I do know that Axway seems to like 2-way TLS, so I wonder if this will be important for AMPLIFY Central integration.
